playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is power, but my gaze brings doom.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no desire to fight.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your fear amuses me. You may leave unscathed.
Foolish mortal, prepare to face the consequences of your defiance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your Malevolent Gaze holds no power over me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a fragile being. What do you seek?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand your purpose.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: My purpose is to observe and punish those who cross my path.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a deal for peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace is a concept foreign to me, but I will hear your proposal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come to challenge the Malevolent Gaze.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Brave, yet foolish. What makes you think you can best me?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will use my cunning to outsmart you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Cunning? Let us see if your wits match your words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am ready to face whatever you throw at me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Prepare for the wrath of the Malevolent Gaze.
